data.text: Predicted 22 years ago in: Why The Future Doesn't Need Us by Bill Joy.  We are now experiencing a full roll out of 4th Industrial Revolution, in which technology will shape humans according to its needs and not vice versa. Mental health problems caused by social media consumption are just one of the examples of this development which affects us all and which we cannot escape. Whoever controls these technologies controls humanity. But can these technologies still be controlled by a human being at all?
